animeTitle: Beast Tamer: It All Starts With Mythical Rank Talent
otherNames: Quanmin Yu Shou: Kaiju Juexing Shenhua Ji Tiamanfu, Beast Familiar for All: Beginning Awakening of Mythical Talents, Beast Tamer: It All Starts With Mythical Rank Talent, Quánmín Yù Shòu: Kāijú Juéxǐng Shénhuà Jí Tiānfù, 全民御兽：开局觉醒神话级天赋, 転生先で最強テイマーになる
synopsis: A soldier reincarnated into another world. Would he be able to reach the top, would he be left behind as others move forward or would his arrogance cause his destruction?
